name: Handle Uspacy webhook confirmations and parse events for custom scenarios
description:
This template simplifies Uspacy webhook integration by automatically handling subscription confirmations and event parsing. No need to manually configure webhook confirmations or parse incoming events - the template does this for you.

What you get:

Automatic webhook subscription confirmation

Pre-parsed events ready to use

Clean foundation to build your custom automation

How to use: Simply duplicate this template and add your specific automation logic. The heavy lifting of webhook handling is already done.

Setup guide: Follow our [step-by-step instructions](https://ua.uspacy.support/en/articles/11865022) to connect Uspacy webhook and customize the template for your needs.

Support: Created by Uspacy. Contact support@uspacy.com for help.
